title: Antidiabetic potentials of crude and purified sulphated polysaccharides isolated from Gracilaria gracilis, a seaweed from South Africa
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Leah R. Pillay, Tosin A. Olasehinde, Kolawole A. Olofinsan, Ochuko L. Erukainure, Md. Shahidul Islam, Ademola O. Olaniran
